item.title: AIR lands $23M to bring its eVTOLs to the US
item.description: Israel-based eVTOL startup AIR has raised $23 million to scale production of both its piloted and uncrewed cargo aircraft, and enter the U.S.

item.title: TernX Review (2025): Travel With Young Kids Just Got Easier
item.description: This carry-on suitcase can transform into a simple stroller, perfect for weekend trips with a little one.
